com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.entities

Class AiBoat

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionObject

    public class AiBoat
extends Boat
    Represents the AI's boat.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void check_turn(java.util.List<CollisionObject> collidables)
      Fire a number of rays with limited distance out the front of the boat, select a ray that isn't obstructed by an object, preference the middle (maybe put a preference to side as well) if every ray is obstructed either (keep turning [left or right] on the spot until one is, or choose the one that is obstructed furthest away the second option (choose the one that is obstructed furthest away) is better.
      protected com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 get_ray_fire_point()
      Return centre coordinates of point where ray is fired.
      void initialise()
      Shared initialisation functionality among all constructors.
      boolean isShown()
      Returns true if AIBoat should exist on the screen.
      void updatePosition(java.util.List<CollisionObject> collidables)
      Updates position of objects AIBoat based on acceleration and stamina.

      • AiBoat

        public AiBoat(float x,
              float y)
        Construct a AIBoat object at point (x,y) with default size, texture and animation.
        Parameters:
        x - float coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - float coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat

      • AiBoat

        public AiBoat(float x,
              float y,
              com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
        Construct a AiBoat at point (x, y) with default size and with chosen texture.
        Parameters:
        x - bottom left X coordinate
        y - bottom left Y coordinate
        texture - texture for boat

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public void initialise()
        Shared initialisation functionality among all constructors.

        Initialises the ray properties. Rays are used to help the AI control the boat based on visual feedback of its environment i.e. obstacles such as movable obstacles and static lane wall obstacles.

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition(java.util.List<CollisionObject> collidables)
        Updates position of objects AIBoat based on acceleration and stamina.

        Checks if AIBoat can turn and updates position accordingly based on any collision objects that may overlap.

        Parameters:
        collidables - List of Collision Objects

      • isShown

        public boolean isShown()
        Returns true if AIBoat should exist on the screen.
        Specified by:
        isShown in interface CollisionObject
        Overrides:
        isShown in class GameObject
        Returns:
        boolean parent isShown

      • get_ray_fire_point

        protected com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 get_ray_fire_point()
        Return centre coordinates of point where ray is fired.
        Returns:
        Vector2 of coordinates

      • check_turn

        protected void check_turn(java.util.List<CollisionObject> collidables)
        Fire a number of rays with limited distance out the front of the boat, select a ray that isn't obstructed by an object, preference the middle (maybe put a preference to side as well) if every ray is obstructed either (keep turning [left or right] on the spot until one is, or choose the one that is obstructed furthest away the second option (choose the one that is obstructed furthest away) is better.
        Parameters:
        collidables - List of Collision Objects
